Html:
When going through the 'Southridge Labs' tutorial, the 'ribbon.ApplicationMenu' always comes up on the left hand of the screen, rather than the right, as it does in Office 2007, Paint (on Windows 7), and WordPad (on Windows 7). See http://cid-a45fe702de180b23.skydrive.live.com/self.aspx/Public/RibbonAnnoyance2.png for a screenshot.

Is there some way to change this?

Thank you

M.Ahrens
